snippet: Niladri Chaterjee, whose social media posts were often critical of Islam, became the fourth online activist for secularism in the country to be fatally attacked this year.
abstract: Police in Bangladesh report fourth fatal attack against secular blogger in 2015; Niladri Chaterjee, activist whose online posts often criticized Islam, is killed by group of assailants who enter his home under false pretenses.

byline.original: By JULFIKAR ALI MANIK and ELLEN BARRY
byline.contributor: Julfikar Ali Manik reported from Dhaka, and Ellen Barry from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: Niladri Chaterjee, whose social media posts were often critical of Islam, became the fourth online activist for secularism in the country to be fatally attacked this year.

headline.main: Another Secular Blogger in Bangladesh Is Killed
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Bangladesh: Secular Blogger Is Killed
